LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2014-04-28T17:08:40Z Saul Hewish 2014-04-28T18:58:19+01:00 2014-04-28T18:58:19+01:00 Conference Event Announcement: Where Does Talent Come From? https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACCESS-VOCATIONAL-GUIDANCE;dfb4091b.1404 List subscribers maybe interested in the following event.<br><br>Apologies for any cross posting.<br><br>Where Does Talent Come From<br>& how do you nurture it?<br><br>23 July 2014<br><br>A one-day conference event presented<br>at the Hyatt Regency Hotel, Birmingham, UK<br><br>With Speakers:\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd<br><br>Germaine Greer, Academic, Author and Journalist\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd<br>Tim Harford, Economist and Author\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd<br>Adrian Furnham, Professor of Psychology University of London\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd<br>John Bergman, founder of Geese Theatre Company (USA)<br>Daniella Genas, Director Aspire4U\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd<br>Laura Caulfield, School of Society, Enterprise and Environment, Bath Spa University [...]
